Instructions
1. Install the extension
2. Go to the chatGPT website. The extension only works on https://chat.openai.com/ 
3. Chat with ChatGPT.
3. Wait for a response! The  'contextGPT' button only appears after the response is complete.
5. Click on the button to turn on questions mode.
